feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-24T09:59:05.875596Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Debian riscv64</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.aurel32.net/welcome-debian-riscv64.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T01： 58:12.292155Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.aurel32.net/welcome-debian-riscv64.html"/>; <author>; <name>;pabs3</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pabs3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;经过多年的努力，Debian riscv64现已成为官方架构。该端口需要重新启动、修复错误并重新安装构建守护程序，然后才能发布。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#debian-riscv64" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36841798" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text ">;让事情脱离谈判的“三件事”练习（2011）</stitle>; <id>;https://math.stanford.edu/~vakil/thirdthings.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T02:58:12.322413Z</updated>; <link href="https://math.stanford.edu/~vakil/thirdthings.html"/>; <author>; <name>;mutant_glofish</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mutant_glofish</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;“三件事”练习是一种从演讲中提取有价值信息的方法。目标是将演讲中的三个关键要点写在一张纸或索引卡上。这些要点可以是定理、激发问题、问题或演讲中突出的任何其他内容。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the- Three-things-exercise-for-getting-things-out-of-talks-2011" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36842239" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;死亡金属英语 (2013)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.invisibleoranges.com/death-metal-english/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T23:58:12.324254Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.invisibleoranges.com/death-metal-english /"/>; <author>; <name>;cdme</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cdme</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.invisibleoranges.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/23/suffocation-thumb-e1383930752525-1052x592.jpg"样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：124像素；” />;<br />;Vastum 的死亡金属英语歌词使用残酷和夸张的隐喻来表达色情和性行为。死亡金属乐队使用死亡金属英语让他们的歌词听起来更加残酷并唤起邪恶感。死亡金属英语的特点是使用大词、形容词、介词短语、进行时、被动语态、古老或伪圣经的措辞、夸张的隐喻以及不合逻辑或无意义的句子。它可以应用于任何主题，将普通的短语变成病态的死亡金属歌曲。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#death-metal-english-2013" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821808" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;显示 HN：我的钢笔绘图之旅</stitle>; <id>;https://adamfuhrer.com/pen-plotting-experiments</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T01:58:12.325021Z</updated>; <link href="https://adamfuhrer.com/pen-plotting-experiments"/>; <author>; <name>;adamfuhrer</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=adamfuhrer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.adamfuhrer.com/assets/images/main-gradient.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;多伦多前端工程师。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-my-pen-plotting-journey" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36842182" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;ldd 任意代码执行 (2009)</stitle>; <id>;https://catonmat.net/ldd- Arbitration-code-execution</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T21:58:12.326536Z</updated>; <link href="https://catonmat.net/ldd- Arbitration-code-execution"/>; <author>; <name>;xk3</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=xk3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://catonmat.net/images/catonmat-logo-clean.png" style="width: 220px; height: 88px;" />;<br />;ldd 实用程序可用于确定可执行文件的动态库依赖项，但也可被利用来运行任意代码。本文探讨了此漏洞并提供了获取系统管理员权限的社会工程场景。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ldd-centric-code-execution-2009" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36839800" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;李小龙和我</stitle>; <id>;https://kareem.substack.com/p/bruce-lee-and-me</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T05:58:12.328066Z</updated>; <link href="https://kareem.substack.com/p/bruce-lee-and-me"/>; <作者>; <name>;yla92</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yla92</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F2f1 9825b-4e4c-4b40-a089-f0848ed5362a_1080x1080.jpeg" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：220 像素；" />;<br />;五十年前，卡里姆·阿卜杜勒·贾巴尔得知李小龙去世的消息，这对他打击很大，因为李小龙不仅是他的武术老师，也是他的亲密朋友。阿卜杜勒-贾巴尔描述了他多年来所经历的巨大损失，并反思了如果李小龙没有在 32 岁时去世，他会如何生活。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bruce-lee-and-me" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36843514" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;HP 45（以及35和80）计算器模拟器</stitle>; <id>;https://sarahkmarr.com/retrohp1973.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T03:58:12.328736Z</updated>; <link href="https://sarahkmarr.com/retrohp1973.html"/>; <author>; <name>;linsomniac</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=linsomniac</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://sarahkmarr.com/hp1973Window.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;HP-1973 是一个基于 Python 的计算器模拟器，可以运行 HP-45、HP-35 和 HP-80 计算器的 ROM 代码。它提供了一个带有各种自定义选项的 GUI 界面，并提供了有关计算器内部工作原理的详细帮助。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hp-45-and-35-and-80-calculator-emulator" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36842839" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Llama2.c：在一个纯 C 文件中推理 llama 2</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/karpathy/llama2.c</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T18:58:12.329445Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/karpathy/llama2.c"/>; <author>; <name>;anj neymidha</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=anjneymidha</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/karpathy/llama2.c/master/assets/llama_cute.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;使用此代码，您可以在 PyTorch 中从头开始训练 Llama 2 LLM 架构，将权重保存到原始二进制文件中，并将其加载到 C 文件中进行推理。 C 文件可以通过简单的方法以交互速率运行合理大小的模型。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llama2-c-inference-llama-2-in-one-file-of-pure-c" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36838051" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Inkscape 1.3</stitle>; <id>;https://inkscape.org/news/2023/07/23/inkscape-launches-version-13-focus-organizing-work/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T06:58:12.330175Z</updated>; <link href="https://inkscape.org/ news/2023/07/23/inkscape-launches-version-13-focus-organizing-work/"/>; <author>; <name>;Reventlov</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Reventlov</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.inkscape.org/media/news/uploads/about-screen-contest-1-3-splash.png"样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：83像素；” />;<br />;Inkscape 推出 1.3 版，重点是高效组织工作 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#inkscape-1-3" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36843794" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;美国参议院通过 DEA 制定的法案以端到端加密为目标</stitle>; <id>;https://therecord.media/senate-dea-bill-targets-end-to-end-encryption-requires-companies-to-report-drugs</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T00:58:12.330840Z</updated >; <link href="https://therecord.media/senate-dea-bill-targets-end-to-end-encryption-requires-companies-to-report-drugs"/>; <author>; <name>;walterbell</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=walterbell</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cms.therecord.media/uploads/Suzanne_S malley_27e80bc465.png?w=3840" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;一项要求社交媒体公司、加密通信提供商和其他在线服务向美国缉毒局 (DEA) 报告其平台上的毒品活动的法案已提交参议院审议。该法案引起了隐私倡导者的担忧，他们认为该法案将公司变成了事实上的缉毒机构，并威胁到端到端加密。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#us-senate-bill-crafted-with-dea-targets-end-to-end-encryption" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36841369" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么框架向前倾斜（2015）</stitle>; <id>;https://chcollins.com/100Billion/2015/02/why-frames-tilt-forward/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T22:58:12.331490Z</updated>; <link href="https://chcollins. com/100Billion/2015/02/why-frames-tilt-forward/"/>; <author>; <name>;theospears</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=theospears</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://chcollins.com/100Billion/wp-content/uploads/hang-tension3-300x2 18.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：160px；" />;<br />;当电线连接到框架的背面并且框架的质心位于该点的前面时，框架向前倾斜。质心距车架后部越远，扭矩越大，车架倾斜越大。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-frames-tilt-forward-2015" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36840282" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;教您的法学硕士用事实而非虚构来回答</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.myscale.com/2023/07/17/teach-your-llm-vector-sql/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T22:58:12.332187Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.myscale.com/2023/07/17/teach -your-llm-vector-sql/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jinqueeny</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jinqueeny</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.myscale.com/assets/img/chatgpt-hallucination-response.435cec3e.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：122px ;” />;<br />;大型语言模型 (LLM) 是先进的人工智能系统，可以回答广泛的问题。然而，他们可能会对不熟悉的话题做出不准确的反应，这被称为幻觉。为了提高法学硕士的准确性，在查询中添加事实和支持文档非常重要。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#teach-your-llm-to-answer-with-facts-not-fiction" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36840728" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;育碧帐户（包括游戏）可因不活动而永久删除</stitle>; <id>;https://www.pcgamer.com/your-ubisoft-account-can-be-suspended-and-subsequently-permanently-deleted-for-inactivity-take-your-games-library-with-it/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T05:58： 12.332898Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.pcgamer.com/your-ubisoft-account-can-be-suspended-and-subsequently-permanently-deleted-for-inactivity-take-your-games-library-with-it/"/>; <author>; <name>;yabatopia</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yabatopia</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/KXhtHDz2BcAgX7KYcVgLCJ-320-80.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：123px；" />;<br />;让育碧帐户处于非活动状态太长时间会导致其面临被永久删除的风险。育碧支持人员确认了一封电子邮件的合法性，该电子邮件通知用户因不活动而关闭帐户。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ubisoft-account-include-games-can-be-permanently-deleted-for-inactivity" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36843572" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;年轻人纷纷涌向占星学</stitle>; <id>;https://www.washingtonpost.com/lifestyle/2023/06/13/astrology-millennials-gen-z-science/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T22:58:12.333608Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.washington post.com/lifestyle/2023/06/13/astrology-millennials-gen-z-science/"/>; <author>; <name>;bookofjoe</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bookofjoe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-apps/imrs.php?src=https://s3.amazonaws。 com/arc-authors/washpost/746a8401-ccc8-492d-986e-b24f68639b61.png&w=196&h=196" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;占星学领域在年轻一代的推动下正在蓬勃发展，到2021年价值将达到128亿美元。许多人转向占星学来寻求自我完善和个人成长。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#young-people-are-flocking-to-astrology" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36840674" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;乐观、傲慢和战略失实陈述</stitle>; <id>;https://albertcory50.substack.com/p/optimism-hubris-and-strategic-misrepresentation</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T04:58:12.334410Z</updated>; <link href="https://albertcory50.substack.com/p/optimism-hub ris-and-strategic-misrepresentation"/>; <作者>; <name>;AlbertCory</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=AlbertCory</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2F substack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F5a8d3ec6-3b5c-43cc-9a58-ea15560c9dea_1920x700.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：81px；" />;<br />;IT 项目常常是灾难，预算超支和失败。这些问题并不是计算机项目所独有的，而是由人性和政治因素造成的。乐观、傲慢和战略误传是这些失败背后的一些原因。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#optimism-hubris-and-strategic-misrepresentation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;眼镜熊数量惊人</stitle>; <id>;https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/roundtable/sur prising-dearth-spectacled-bears</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T02:58:12.335831Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/roundtable/surprising-dearth-spectacled-bears"/>; <作者>; <name>;samclemens</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= samclemens</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/sites/default/files/dickie_inset_1.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 185px;" />;<br />;帕丁顿熊是迈克尔·邦德创作的深受喜爱的角色，原本以非洲为背景，但由于非洲缺乏熊，不得不改为南美。在南美丛林中发现的眼镜熊成为帕丁顿熊的灵感来源。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-surprising-dearth-of-spectacled-bears" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36809994" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;古斯塔夫·莫罗的神秘画作</stitle>; <id>;https://www.thecollector.com/gustave-moreau-paintings/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T01:58:12.337226Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.thecollector.com/gustave-moreau-paintings/"/>; <author>; <name>;pris matic</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=prismatic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.thecollector.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/gustave-moreau-paintings.jpg?width=1400&quality=70" style="width: 220px; height: 127px;" />;<br />;古斯塔夫·莫罗以传统学院派画家的身份开始了他的职业生涯，并在巴黎沙龙展出。在一系列负面评论之后，这位艺术家退出了社会，七年没有崭露头角。他重返巴黎艺术界后所展示的辉煌而梦幻的画作震惊了评论家，并激励了新一代艺术家。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gustave-moreau-s-mystical-paintings" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36832191" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;VirtualBox 7.0.10 下载链接已消失</stitle>; <id>;https://web.archive.org/web/20230723100307/https://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Downloads</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T23:58:12.338587Z</updated>; <link href="https://web.archive.org /web/20230723100307/https://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Downloads"/>; <author>; <name>;trashburger</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=trashburger</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://web.archive.org/web/20230723100309im_/https:// www.virtualbox.org/graphics/vboxlogodown.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：77px；" />;<br />;如果您正在寻找最新的 VirtualBox 6.1 软件包，请参阅 VirtualBox 6.1 版本。版本 6.1 将继续受支持到 2023 年 12 月。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#virtualbox-7-0-10-download-links-have-disappeared" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36841272" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </ent ry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;PLJS – PostreSQL 的 JavaScript 语言插件</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/plv8/pljs</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T19:58:12.339327Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/plv8/pljs"/>; <author>; <name >;alonp99</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=alonp99</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/8a276b6f326c15c50ccc228009144222a992010bf516cb65b21d6ca018f19 028/plv8/pljs" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;PLJS是一个紧凑、轻量级的PostgreSQL JavaScript语言插件。它使用 QuickJS 作为 JavaScript 引擎，易于构建和维护。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#pljs-javascript-language-plugin-for-postresql" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36838994" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;石墙和历史港口是生物多样性意想不到的避风港</stitle>; <id>;https://hakaimagazine.com/news/stone-walls-and-historical-harbors-are-unexpected-havens-of-biodiversity/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T19:58:12.340035Z</updated>; <link href="https://hakaimagazine .com/news/stone-walls-and-historical-harbors-are-unexpected-havens-of-biodiversity/"/>; <author>; <name>;benbreen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=benbreen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://hakaimagazine.com/wp-content/uploads/body-culture-masonry.jpg “样式=”宽度：220px;高度：118px;“ />;<br />;旧港口基础设施和石墙为多种海洋动物提供了栖息地，有时甚至比自然海岸线更加多样化。研究结果支持保护海洋遗产地，并可为新水下基础设施的设计提供信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stone-walls-and-historical-harbors-are-unexpected-havens-of-biodiversity" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821123" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;OpenBSD：AMD 处理器微代码支持添加到-current</stitle>; <id>;https://undeadly.org/cgi?action=article;sid=20230723185853</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T19:58:12.340694Z</updated>; <link href="https://und eadly.org/cgi?action=article;sid=20230723185853"/>; <author>; <name>;peter_hansteen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=peter_hansteen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;感谢 Jonathan Gray (jsg@) 的一系列提交，-current 现在支持 AMD（amd64 和i386）处理器：很高兴看到对 AMD 方面的支持与对英特尔的支持相当（2018 年增加了对英特尔的支持）。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#openbsd-amd-processor-microcode-support-added-to-current" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36838511" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;NATS.io 的高性能服务器，云和边缘原生消息传递系统</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/nats-io/nats-server</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T18:58:12.341350Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/nats-io/nats-server"/>; <author>; <name>;Kin rany</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Kinrany</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://repository-images.githubusercontent.com/6443435/ac1f0d00-d7e9-11eb-8193-83a08bd77530" style="width: 220px; height: 110px ;” />;<br />;NATS 是一个简单、安全且高性能的数字系统、服务和设备通信系统。 NATS 是云原生计算基金会 (CNCF) 的一部分。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#high-performance-server-for-nats-io-the-cloud-and-edge-native-messaging-system" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820544" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Icon Buddy – 100K+ 开源 SVG 图标，完全可定制</stitle>; <id>;https://iconbuddy.app/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T17:58:12.342138Z</updated>; <link href="https://iconbuddy.app/"/>; <author>; <name>;mddanishyu suf</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mddanishyusuf</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://iconbuddy.app/icongroup-2-left.png" style="width: 220px; height: 173px;" />;<br />;我们有多种格式可供选择，因此您可以下载您想要的格式的图标。我们有 SVG、PNG、WEBP、JSX、VUE 和 BASE64、URL、CSS 背景截图、HTML 图像标签。我们拥有一切。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#icon-buddy-100k-open-source-svg-icons-very-customizable" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36837442" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hack ernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;加州所有寄养儿童现在都可以免费进入任何州立大学</stitle>; <id>;https://themessenger.com/news/all-foster-kids-in-california-can-now-attend-any-state-college-for-free</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T21:58:12.343035Z</updated>; < link href="https://themessenger.com/news/all-foster-kids-in-california-can-now-attend-any-state-college-for-free"/>; <author>; <name>;pessimizer</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pessimizer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cms.themessenger.com/wp-content/upload s/2023/07/UCLA-143309512.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：137px；" />;<br />;根据本周签署的法律，加州各地寄养的儿童和青少年将能够免费就读州立大学和社区大学。新的“寄养未来”计划将拨款 2500 万美元，用于支付就读加州州立大学、加州大学或社区学院的寄养青少年的学费。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#all-foster-kids-in-california-can-now-attend-any-state-college-for-free" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36839983" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;历史与好莱坞：奥本海默</stitle>; <id>;https://www.historyvshollywood.com/reelfaces/oppenheimer/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T04:58:12.343727Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.historyvshollywood.com/ reelfaces/oppenheimer/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;keiferski</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=keiferski</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.historyvshollywood.com/reelfaces/images/2022/12/oppenheimer/social.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px； ” />;<br />;J.被誉为“原子弹之父”的洛斯阿拉莫斯实验室主任罗伯特·奥本海默与他在剑桥的导师关系不睦。奥本海默在导师的桌子上留下了一个有毒的苹果，但幸运的是，它没有被吃掉。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#history-vs-hollywood-oppenheimer" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36843032" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
